title: Okta and AWS IAM Identity Center identity provider integration with Microsoft Entra Permissions Management
description: You can now configure Okta/ AWS IAM Identity Center identity provider integration with Microsoft Entra Permissions Management. By getting the insight into single sign-on data regarding permissions assignment to cloud environments, Permissions Management can provide more accurate analytics. By reading role assignments and user data from IdP side, Permissions Management can effectively calculate permissions granted and as a result precise permissions creep.
